Quotes.title: Today's Inspiring Verse
Quotes.quran1: And among His signs is this: that He created for you mates from among yourselves, that you may dwell in tranquility with them, and He has put love and mercy between your hearts.
Quotes.quran2: And marry the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves.
Quotes.hadith1: When a person marries, he has fulfilled half of his religion.
Quotes.hadith2: O young people! Those among you who can support a wife should marry, for it helps him lower his gaze and guard his modesty.
Quotes.hadith3: Marriage is part of my Sunnah. Whoever does not follow my Sunnah has nothing to do with me.
Quotes.wisdom1: Nikah is not just a contract; it is a sacred bond founded on love, respect, and commitment in Islam.

NikahSimplified.mainSubtitle: Our platform is built on Islamic principles to make finding a righteous partner easier for both families and individuals.
NikahSimplified.parents_subtitle: Fulfilling your sacred duty with ease and trust.
NikahSimplified.parents_para1: Easing the path to Nikah for your children is one of the greatest responsibilities and rewards. Our platform helps you find suitable, verified matches from our community while respecting our traditions. Avoid unnecessary delays and societal pressures.
NikahSimplified.parents_para2: Involve yourself in a blessed process, where character and piety are valued above all. With our help, you can connect with families who share your values.
NikahSimplified.youth_subtitle: Start your journey with the right intentions.
NikahSimplified.youth_step1_desc: Look for a partner whose faith and character will help you grow closer to Allah.
NikahSimplified.youth_step2_desc: Create a sincere profile. Honesty is the foundation of a blessed union.
NikahSimplified.youth_step3_desc: Seek the guidance and blessings of your elders. Our platform facilitates family involvement.
